channel.title: [718] Sending Items to Interface
channel.description:
I'm trying to add clue scrolls into my server. I got everything to work great except for the reward screen. I can send the interface (364), but I can't get the items to show up.
My code to send the interface and items :
[code=java]//Send the reward Interface p.getInterfaceManager().sendInterface(364); p.getPackets().sendItems(364, items);[/code]

item.title: [718] Sending Items to Interface
